ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clm0.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |

| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_clmsubrg | |- ( W e. CMod -> K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
